purpose: To provide a cloud-native API gateway solution that facilitates API management, dynamic routing, load balancing, and security for microservices.
principle: Built on top of NGINX and leveraging LuaJIT for high-performance processing, it utilizes a plugin architecture for extensibility.
reusability: Supports a wide range of plugins for authentication, rate limiting, and custom logic, and can be integrated with various cloud environments and orchestration tools like Kubernetes.
limitations: Requires knowledge of Lua for custom plugin development; complexity may increase with highly customized configurations.
name: apisix
description: The Cloud-Native API Gateway and AI Gateway
highlight: Highly extensible cloud-native API gateway with support for dynamic routing, load balancing, and plugin architecture.
